description: Ms. codex. Title provided by cataloger. On fol. 1a-3a: Short verses of poetry; title (al-Mukhṭār); ownership statements; reading statements. On fol. 59a-b: Inscriptions and short texts. On fol. 60a: Title page (al-Ḥuṣn al-ṣarīḥ); ownership statements. On fol. 84b: Several inscriptions. Fol. 1-2 are later fly-leaves (glazed (European?) paper). Foliation in pencil using Western numerals. According to the colophons, the first text was copied in Shaʻbān 856 (fol. 58b) and the second text in Malaṭyah in Rabīʻ al-Awwal 773 by Ḥamīd ibn Maḥmūd ibn Aḥmad al-Khwārizmī (fol. 83a).
author: Kutubī, Muḥammad ibn Shākir, -1363
abstract: Collection of two compilations of verses of poetry.
contents: 1. fol. 1b-58b: al-Mukhṭār min Rawḍ al-azhār lil-shaykh Ṣalāḥ al-Dīn al-Kutubī.
2. fol. 60a-84a: Kitāb al-Ḥuṣn al-ṣarīḥ fī miʼat malīḥ / [Khalīl ibn Aybak al-Ṣafadī].
extent: 84 leaves: paper ; 163 x 125 (120-125 x 93-98) mm. bound to 168 x 136 mm.

title.@value: al-Mukhṭār min Rawḍ al-azhār lil-shaykh Ṣalāḥ al-Dīn al-Kutubī. Kitāb al-Ḥuṣn al-ṣarīḥ fī miʼat malīḥ.

provenance: Ownership statements and reading statements on fol. 1a-3a, 60a. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: Kutubī, Muḥammad ibn Shākir, -1363
كتبي، محمد بن شاكر
